rowObjects.data:
{
  "AssociationID": {{ Select_Association.selectedOptionValue }},
	"Ticket": {{ FetchTicketAssociation.data.length + 1 }},
	"Abbreviation": {{UpdateAbbreviation.text}},
  "Name": {{ Update_Association_Name.text }},
  "EmailAssociation": {{ Update_Association_Email.text }},
  "Password": {{ Update_Association_Password.text }},
  "Color": {{ Update_Association_Color.text }},
  "JoinMembership": {{ Update_Association_Membership.text }},
  "Logo": {{ Update_Association_Logo.text }},
  "Banner": {{ Update_Association_Banner.text }},
  "Mission": {{ Update_Association_Description.text }},
  "Facebook": {{ Update_Association_Facebook.text }},
  "Instagram": {{ Update_Association_Instagram.text }},
  "LinkedIn": {{ Update_Association_Linkedin.text }}
}
